rows.label: qst006002_msg0002
rows.name:
Yep... The four pieces
together perfectly.

rows.label: qst006002_msg0004
rows.name:
"Therein lay a mighty lake and a temple
housing technology of the ancients."

rows.label: qst006002_msg0005
rows.name:
"But with the Divine Beast's decline, dangerous
monsters began to roam these drifts."

rows.label: qst006002_msg0006
rows.name:
"To avoid these monsters, the people
made use of the land's great pillars to
build new dwellings."

rows.label: qst006002_msg0007
rows.name:
"Yet now, as the snows grow stronger
and deeper, we are forced to retreat
still further to ever higher ground."

rows.label: qst006002_msg0008
rows.name:
"If we do not solve this problem soon,
all of Luxuria may become unlivable..."

rows.label: qst006002_msg0010
rows.name:
That's your lot. Looks like some
kind of investigation report.

rows.label: qst006002_msg0011
rows.name:
Then this line of enquiry
was a dead end...

rows.label: qst006002_msg0013
rows.name: Hmph. You need not coddle me.

rows.label: qst006002_msg0014
rows.name:
Instead of wasting time here, we
should search for another lead!
